product_name: Primal Wear Vasca Bike Jersey - Women's - 2013 Overstock
long_description: The women's Primal Wear Vasca Bike Jersey was designed with a keen eye for cycling performance, blending equal parts fit, function and fashion. Speed-Pro(R) polyester fabric pulls sweat off your skin to the surface and dries fast. Sublimated graphics are brilliantly bold yet do not inhibit breathability. Hidden 3/4-length front zipper lets you vent body heat. Droptail rear hemline for complete coverage; 3 back pockets. Primal Wear Vasca Bike Jersey for women sports raglan sleeves for nonbinding, seamless comfort at the shoulders. Overstock.
short_description: The women's Primal Wear Vasca Bike Jersey was designed with a keen eye for cycling performance, blending equal parts fit, function and fashion.
